layout-portfolio.contact-message: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. If you have any questions, comments, or just want to say hi, feel free to contact me. I will always be happy to listen to your ideas and collaborate on interesting projects. You can contact me through the contact form or via email. I look forward to hearing from you soon!
layout-portfolio.error-message: ❌ Error sending email, please complete all fields correctly
layout-portfolio.success-message: ✅ The email has been sent successfully

layout-blog.slogan: Your place to learn web programming
